0.3.name: wordpress/wp-simple-tracker
0.3.description:
WP Simple Tracker is a functional (yet basic) issue tracking system to plug right in your WordPress powered site! Operating an issue tracking system has never been this easy!

Currently it can operate one tracker per blog. However the back-end was designed to allow as many trackers as you might want. This will be targeted in a later release.

This plugin is based on WP-IssueTracker by Mahmoud Sakr, which is no longer maintained by the author. You can upgrade directly from that to this, by removing it and installing this instead. Your existing issues will remain intact.
